header.title: Sámi School History Conference 2016 | Samisk Høgskole

p.em: Sámi University of Applied Sciences organizes Sámi School History Conference November 15th-16th 2016 in Guovdageaidnu Norway.

body.p: The aim of the conference is to highlight and construct the research of today and the future research needs.
More information can be found at the conference web site: http://samischoolhistoryconference2016.weebly.com/
Pigga Keskitalo Associate Professor Vuosttašamanuensa pigga.keskitalo@samiskhs.no tel. +47 78 44 84 00 mobil. +358404197175
